original_title: Woman and her lover arrested over 6-year old girl’s death
original_body_lines: A 25-year-old woman and her lover had been arrested in connection with the death of a 6-year-old girl at Pinkella in Hirana, police said.
The Hirana Police launched an investigation after the hearing and speech-impaired girl had died under suspicious circumstances. She was the daughter of the female suspect, police said.

Investigations revealed that the girl had been staying with her mother and her mother’s 29-year-old lover and the child was not provided with the necessary treatment although she had been ill for a few days.
It had been revealed that the mother's lover had often assaulted the child. Police said there were several swelling and bruise marks on the girl's body.

Accordingly, the mother and her lover were arrested over the girl's death and her body had been sent to the Colombo South Teaching Hospital for a post-mortem after a magisterial inquest had been conducted.
